The table columns for pi0 are:
---
p_T (transverse momentum)
R_{dA} (nuclear modification factor)
err_A (stat err \oplus syst_err_A (syst_err_A: point-to-point error
       uncorrelated between p_T bins))
err_B (syst err which is p_T correlated, all points move in the same
       direction, but not by the same factor)
err_ C (all points move by the same factor, independent of p_T
        (normalization error))
err_tot (total error)

---
pT   &  R_{dA} & error_A & error_B & error_C & error_tot

1.25   0.817492   0.0528825   0.0526173   0.0723134   0.0998035
1.75   0.927239   0.0602504   0.0603254   0.0820214   0.113684
2.25   1.01603   0.068767   0.0703758   0.0898754   0.12834

11   0.373342   0.855191   0.0582451   0.033025   0.266622


The table columns for (h^+ + h^-)/2 are:
---
index (i)
transverse momentum (p_T)
nuclear modification factor (R_{dA})
stat err (stat err)
syst error which can vary with p_T lower (-sys_v)
                 "                 upper (+sys_v)
above syst error \oplus normalization error lower (-sys_t)
                 "                          upper (+sys_t)
---
